step.name: Mix poolish ingredients
step.description: Add all following ingredients into a container, mix well.

ingredient.name: Flour
ingredient.description: All purpose flour or Pizza flour.

ingredient.name: Water
ingredient.description: Room temperature water, do not use warm water.

ingredient.name: Honey
ingredient.description: Or sugar if you do not have honey

step.name: Rest the poolish
step.instruction: Cover and rest at room temperature for 1 hour.

step.name: Proof the poolish
step.instruction: Cover with an air-tight lid and keep in the fridge for 12 hours.

step.name: Mix wet ingredients and the Poolish
step.instruction: In a large bowl, add the poolish, water and oil, mix about 2-3 minutes until fully combined and smooth.

step.name: Add flour and salt
step.instruction: Add flour and salt, mix and knead for a few minutes until fully combined without any dry lumps. The dough will be very sticky, but don't worry.

ingt.name: Flour
ingt.description: All purpose flour or Pizza flour.

step.name: Rest the dough
step.instruction: Cover and let it rest for 15 to 20 minutes.

step.name: Fold the dough
step.instruction: Fold the dough using cross and fold method for about 10 minutes unil the dough becomes smooth and stretchy.

step.name: Proof the dough
step.instruction: Cover and let the dough raise for about 2 hours.

step.name: Divide the dough
step.instruction: Divide the dough into desired size using a scraper. Shape the dough into smooth and tight dough balls.

step.name: Final proof
step.instruction: Place the dough balls on a tray, dust it lightly with flour. cover and let it ferment for 1 – 1.5 hours or until doubled in size. The dough will be ready.
